summary: "The Magic Flute" is an opera by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, first performed in 1791. It's a story about Prince Tamino, who is asked to rescue a princess, Pamina, from a powerful priest named Sarastro. Along the way, Tamino learns about Freemasonry and realizes that Sarastro is actually a good guy. In the end, Tamino and Pamina join Sarastro's community, and the bad guys are defeated. It's a popular opera, even inspiring sequels by other composers.
title: The Magic Flute
